caption:
Big day for big heat! 🚛🔥⁠
⁠
Our latest DuoFin system is loaded up and on its way to a customer, bringing precision root zone heating to 48,000 square feet of growing space.⁠
⁠
DuoFin delivers consistent, efficient warmth right where plants need it most — at the roots — helping growers maximize crop quality, accelerate growth, and reduce energy costs.⁠
⁠
Another project powered by smart heating and strong results. 🌱
